name: Roll Tempus
description:
🤖 Destroy thy enemies by rolling your die!

Join the adventures of Altor, Catxel XII XIII and CURIOBOT, as they traverse through the ruins of Sunless Citadel, in search of some adventurers lost in the depths.

This hololive fangame is an adaptation of Hololive Tempus DND campaign, run by Noir Vesper and played by Magni Dezmond, Axel Syrios and Regis Altare.

The game is divided into episodes, with the current released episode being [Episode 0 - Strange Beginnings]

🤖 Credits

Programming / game design / sprites and sound-effects : fie

Thumbnail / main menu art : Pkoi

Base story: Vesper Noir, Magni Dezmond, Axel Syrios and Regis Altare

Emotional Support: My takodachi plushie

All music used is copyright-free and provided by DOVA-SYNDROME

🤖 Controls (keyboard)
  • Arrow-Keys / WSAD              : Move
  • Shift                                         : Run
  • Z / ,                                          : Select
  • X / .                                          : Cancel
  • C / -                                          : Switch Char.
  • Tab                                          : Menu
🤖 Controls (controller)
  • Sticks / D-Pad                         : Move
  • L1 / L2 / R1 / R2                      : Run
  • A button                                  : Select
  • B button                                  : Cancel
  • Y button                                  : Switch Char.
  • Start                                         : Pause
🤖 Disclaimer

This is a free fangame. I'm not affiliated nor endorsed by Hololive, Cover Corp, or any hololive talent in any capacity.

Feel free to do whatever type of content you would like to with the game, like videos and posts. It makes me super happy, so if you do, please share it with me.

🤖 Support

This is a passion project that is totally free to play.

If you would like to support me (thank you), you can do so while downloading the game or through my ko-fi page.

It is by no means required, but I really appreciate all the support! ❤️
